channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on road, 21st June
item.description:
Someone has painted the road with graffiti about a rapist

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ecclesiastical Insurance Using as their smoking shelter, 21st June
item.description:
Ecclesiastical Insurance Are using the path between yew tree road and pioneer avenue as their smoking shelter. It is quite disgusting when having to walk cycle along here and have to go through a group of people smoking on a public path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Court, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Worst bit of road I've seen, 21st June
item.description:
The state of this junction is worse than I've seen before, there are so many holes, so called been 'fixed' looking at the other reports. Anyone been and had a look at it recently?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Mill Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over 50cm hole with lots of large stones that have come loose, 20th June
item.description:
One hole in cul de sac turn by no 6 and a larger hole 90cm near manhole at top of road near where it joins Arle road again lots of loose stones
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Arle Close, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown plants have blocked access completely, 20th June
item.description:
What three words: ///void.discrepancy.fuels End of Mill Lane near River Swilgate, next to a barn and a building that is derelict and fallen down there is a pathway totally blocked

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury

item.title: Locked fence obstructing access, 20th June
item.description:
What three words location: ///pretty.needed.chill The gate at the end of the driveway is locked and obstructing access. I have observed this regularly over the past year or more.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pothole justnoff pavement when sphalt is worn away to form pothole, 20th June
item.description:
Between #37 nd 39 London Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, London Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains blocked on road outside 2 and 3 Lake Cottages, 20th June
item.description:
The drains on the road in front of 2 and 3 Lake Cottages and outside Lynton are blocked and unable to cope with a big downpour of rain as was experienced Sat 15th June 24. The water was working it's way towards the doorways at 2 and 3 Lake Cottages and on the driveway of Lynton. If this happens again to this extent or worse it will result in floods under the front doors of possibly 2 but definitely 3 Lake Cottages.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Lake Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes just before concrete base of ford, made worse by big deposits of gravel on the road around de holes, 20th June
item.description:
Just before the ford, as you come down from Syreford, very close to the entrance to Home Farm and Brook Cottage. It has been repaired several times but not properly, so one pothole is fixed and another one appears. made worse by the accumulation of debris around the potholes, making the depth of the pothole bigger. The ones the other side of the ford have now just been repaired, Sevenhampton side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
